com.pddstudio.networkutils

Class SubnetScannerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pddstudio.networkutils.abstracts.AbstractService
      • com.pddstudio.networkutils.SubnetScannerService

  • public class SubnetScannerService
extends AbstractService
    A Service for scanning for other devices in the current Subnet.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected SubnetScannerService(java.lang.String subNet, ProcessCallback processCallback) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getResponseType()
      The return type of this service.
      void interruptMultiThreadScanning()
      Interrupts the scanning process for multi thread executions.
      boolean isMultiThreadScanning()
      Checks whether the service is currently scanning for devices or not.
      boolean isScanning()
      Checks whether the service is currently scanning for other devices or not.
      SubnetScannerService setTimeout(int timeout) 
      void startMultiThreadScanning()
      Starts scanning the Subnet for other devices (multi thread, means 128 IP-Addresses at the same time, repeated twice).
      void startScan()
      Starts scanning the Subnet for other devices (single thread, means only one IP-Address at the same time).
      void stopScan()
      Stops scanning the Subnet for other devices.

    • Method Detail

      • setTimeout

        public SubnetScannerService setTimeout(int timeout)

      • startScan

        public void startScan()
        Starts scanning the Subnet for other devices (single thread, means only one IP-Address at the same time). For scanning multiple IP-Addresses at the same time use startMultiThreadScanning().
        See Also:
        startMultiThreadScanning()

      • stopScan

        public void stopScan()
        Stops scanning the Subnet for other devices.

      • isScanning

        public boolean isScanning()
        Checks whether the service is currently scanning for other devices or not. Note: Single-Thread scanning only!
        Returns:
        true if service is running, false if not.
        See Also:
        isMultiThreadScanning()

      • startMultiThreadScanning

        public void startMultiThreadScanning()
        Starts scanning the Subnet for other devices (multi thread, means 128 IP-Addresses at the same time, repeated twice). For scanning with single IP-Address checks, use startScan()
        See Also:
        startScan()

      • interruptMultiThreadScanning

        public void interruptMultiThreadScanning()
        Interrupts the scanning process for multi thread executions. Note: Multi-Thread scanning only!

      • isMultiThreadScanning

        public boolean isMultiThreadScanning()
        Checks whether the service is currently scanning for devices or not. Note: Multi-Thread scanning only!
        Returns:
        true if the service is running, false if not.
        See Also:
        isScanning()

      • getResponseType

        public java.lang.Object getResponseType()
        The return type of this service. Objects retrieved via ProcessCallback.onProcessUpdate(Object) must be casted to ScanResult in order to be able to work with the response.
        Specified by:
        getResponseType in class AbstractService
        Returns:
        ScanResult
